original: Koch, Carl Axeil Bertil, häradsihöv-ding, Stenungsund, f. 16/6/05 i Falkö-piag av borgmäst. Sigurd K. o. Tudlie Helander. G. 36 m. Karin Öhrnell. Barn: Margareta f. 38, Marianne 41. — Stud:ex. i Skara 23, jur. kand. i Upps. 26. Fiskal i Svea hovr. 32, as-sess. i hovr. f. Övre Norrl. 37, hovr:-ràd 40, häradsliövd. i Orusts o. Tjörns doms. fr. 44. RNO 43.
translated: Koch, Carl Axel Bertil, district judge, Stenungsund, born on June 16, 1905 in Falköping, son of Mayor Sigurd K. and Tudlie Helander. Married in 1936 to Karin Öhrnell. Children: Margareta, born in 1938, Marianne, born in 1941. Completed high school in Skara in 1923, obtained a law degree in Uppsala in 1926. Fiscal in Svea Court of Appeal in 1932, assessor in the Court of Appeal for Upper Norrland in 1937, court council in 1940, district judge in the Orust and Tjörn district court from 1944. Awarded RNO (Royal Order of the North Star) in 1943.

award.name: Royal Order of the North Star
